revised_title: Improved Bimodular Method for Calculating Logarithms and Antilogarithms
tldr: The author presents an improved bimodular method for calculating natural and tabular logarithms and antilogarithms to twelve or sixteen places with very brief tables. This method is applicable to any system of logarithms and can be used to find antilogarithms from the same tables. The author also discusses the principles of the bimodular method, its relations, and the process of interpolation.
